Title: Relates to the designation of sex by applicants for non-driver identification cards, drivers' licenses and learners' permits
Summary: Provides three options for the designation of sex by applicants for non-driver identification cards, drivers' licenses and learners' permits.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the designation of sex by applicants for non-driver identification cards, drivers' licenses and learners' permits
